title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 118 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 118 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: because his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 你们要称谢耶和华，因他本为善。他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 愿以色列说，他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 愿亚伦的家说，他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: Let them now that fear the LORD say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 愿敬畏耶和华的说，他的慈爱永远长存。

lineList.en: I called upon the LORD in distress: the LORD answered me, and set me in a large place.
lineList.cn: 我在急难中求告耶和华，他就应允我，把我安置在宽阔之地。

lineList.en: The LORD is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?
lineList.cn: 有耶和华帮助我。我必不惧怕。人能把我怎吗样呢。

lineList.en: The LORD taketh my part with them that help me: therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me.
lineList.cn: 在那帮助我的人中，有耶和华帮助我，所以我要看见那恨我的人遭报。

lineList.en: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in man.
lineList.cn: 投靠耶和华，强似衣赖人。

lineList.en: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in princes.
lineList.cn: 投靠耶和华，强似倚赖王子。

lineList.en: All nations compassed me about: but in the name of the LORD will I destroy them.
lineList.cn: 万民围绕我。我靠耶和华的名，必剿灭他们。

lineList.en: They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: but in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.
lineList.cn: 他们环绕我，围困我。我靠耶和华的名，必剿灭他们。

lineList.en: They compassed me about like bees; they are quenched as the fire of thorns: for in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.
lineList.cn: 他们如同蜂子围绕我，好像烧荆棘的火，必被熄灭。我靠耶和华的名，必剿灭他们。

lineList.en: Thou hast thrust sore at me that I might fall: but the LORD helped me.
lineList.cn: 你推我，要叫我跌倒，但耶和华帮助了我。

lineList.en: The LORD is my strength and song, and is become my salvation.
lineList.cn: 耶和华是我的力量，是我的诗歌。他也成了我的拯救。

lineList.en: The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tabernacles of the righteous: the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly.
lineList.cn: 在义人的帐棚里，有欢呼拯救的声音。耶和华的右手施展大能。

lineList.en: The right hand of the LORD is exalted: the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的右手高举。耶和华的右手施展大能。

lineList.en: I shall not die, but live, and declare the works of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 我必不致死，仍要存活，并要传扬耶和华的作为。

lineList.en: The LORD hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.
lineList.cn: 耶和华虽严严地惩治我，却未曾将我交于死亡。

lineList.en: Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them, and I will praise the LORD:
lineList.cn: 给我敞开义门。我要进去称谢耶和华。

lineList.en: This gate of the LORD, into which the righteous shall enter.
lineList.cn: 这是耶和华的门。义人要进去。

lineList.en: I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.
lineList.cn: 我要称谢你，因为你已经应允我，又成了我的拯救。

lineList.en: The stone which the builders refused is become the head stone of the corner.
lineList.cn: 匠人所弃的石头，已成了房角的头块石头。

lineList.en: This is the LORD's doing; it is marvellous in our eyes.
lineList.cn: 这是耶和华所做的，在我们眼中看为希奇。

lineList.en: This is the day which the LORD hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.
lineList.cn: 这是耶和华所定的日子。我们在其中要高兴欢喜。

lineList.en: Save now, I beseech thee, O LORD: O LORD, I beseech thee, send now prosperity.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你拯救。耶和华阿，求你使我们亨通。

lineList.en: Blessed be he that cometh in the name of the LORD: we have blessed you out of the house of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 奉耶和华名来的，是应当称颂的。我们从耶和华的殿中，为你们祝福。

lineList.en: God is the LORD, which hath shewed us light: bind the sacrifice with cords, even unto the horns of the altar.
lineList.cn: 耶和华是神。他光照了我们。理当用绳索把祭牲拴住，牵到坛角那里。

lineList.en: Thou art my God, and I will praise thee: thou art my God, I will exalt thee.
lineList.cn: 你是我的神，我要称谢你。你是我的神，我要尊崇你。

lineList.en: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
lineList.cn: 你们要称谢耶和华，因他本为善。他的慈爱永远长存。
